00009   SP38Interface::SP38Interface(Scenario* sc,string hst){
00010     // Initializing the buffers
00011     in_message_buffer = new byte[MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE];
00012     out_message_buffer = new byte[MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE];
00013     bzero(in_message_buffer, MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE);
00014     bzero(out_message_buffer, MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE);
00015     in_length = 0;
00016     out_length = 0;
00017     communication_state = OFF;
00018     // Setting the host and some defaults
00019     host = hst;
00020     scenario = sc;
00021     noisy = true;
00022     debug = false;
00023   }

00042   int SP38Interface::read_int(byte** buf, int* length){
00043     ubyte* ubuf = (ubyte*)*buf;
00044     int res = ubuf[0]*(1<<24) +  ubuf[1]*(1<<16) +  ubuf[2]*(1<<8) + ubuf[3];
00045     (*buf) += 4;
00046     (*length) -= 4;
00047     return res;
00048   }
00049 
00054   short SP38Interface::read_short(byte** buf, int* length){
00055     ubyte* ubuf = (ubyte*)*buf;
00056     short res = ubuf[0]*(1<<8) + ubuf[1];
00057     (*buf) += 2;
00058     (*length) -= 2;
00059     return res;
00060   }

00066   char SP38Interface::read_char(byte** buf, int* length){
00067     char res = (*buf)[0];
00068     (*buf) ++;
00069     (*length) --;
00070     return res;
00071   }

00077   ubyte SP38Interface::read_ubyte(byte** buf, int* length){

00089   string SP38Interface::read_string(byte** buf, int* length, uint size){
00090     char* tmp = new char[size+1];
00091     for(uint i=0; i<size; i++) tmp[i] = (*buf)[i];
00092     tmp[size] = '\0';
00093     (*buf) += size;
00094     (*length) -= size;
00095     string res(tmp);
00096     delete [] tmp;
00097     return res;
00098   }

00105   void SP38Interface::write_int(int num, byte** buf, int* length){
00106     (*buf)[0] = ((byte*)&num)[3];
00107     (*buf)[1] = ((byte*)&num)[2];
00108     (*buf)[2] = ((byte*)&num)[1];
00109     (*buf)[3] = ((byte*)&num)[0];
00110     (*buf) += 4;
00111     (*length) += 4;  
00112   }

00119   void SP38Interface::write_short(short num, byte** buf, int* length){
00120     (*buf)[0] = ((byte*)&num)[1];
00121     (*buf)[1] = ((byte*)&num)[0];
00122     (*buf) += 2;
00123     (*length) += 2;  
00124   }

00153   void SP38Interface::write_string(string s, byte** buf, int* length){
00154     const char* tmp = s.c_str();
00155     uint size = s.size();
00156     for(uint i=0;i<size;i++) (*buf)[i] = tmp[i];
00157     (*buf) += size;
00158     (*length) += size;
00159   }

00169   void SP38Interface::read_sim_ready_message(byte** buf, int* length){
00170 
00171     string date = read_string(buf,length,8);
00172     string time = read_string(buf,length,6);
00173     int simulation_interval = read_ubyte(buf,length);
00174     int protocol_length = read_ubyte(buf,length);
00175     string protocol = read_string(buf,length,protocol_length);
00176     string version = read_string(buf,length,*length);
00177 
00178     if(noisy || debug){
00179       cout << "Established connection to Simulator" << endl;
00180       cout << "  Sim Version " << version << endl;
00181       cout << "  Protocol " << protocol << endl;
00182       cout << "  Date: " << date << " Time: " << time << endl;
00183       cout << "  Simulation Interval: " << simulation_interval / 10.0 << " s" << endl;
00184       cout << endl;
00185     }
00186 
00187   }

00203       cout << endl;
00204     }
00205     // setting the start_time
00206     start_date = date;
00207     start_time = time;

00232   void SP38Interface::read_sim_error_in_message(byte** buf, int* message_length){
00233     
00234     ubyte error_code = read_ubyte(buf,message_length);
00235     int erroneous_message_length = read_short(buf,message_length);
00236     ubyte erroneous_message_type = read_ubyte(buf,message_length);
00237 
00238     cout << "Simulator detected an error in sent message" << endl;
00239     cout << " - Error type: " << (int)error_code << " in message type " << (int)erroneous_message_type;
00240     cout << " with size " << erroneous_message_length << endl;
00241     
00242     disconnect();
00243     exit(-1);
00244   }

00254   Event* SP38Interface::read_sim_detector_message(byte** buf, int* length){
00255 
00256     // Getting information about the intersection
00257     int scatsIntersectionId = read_int(buf,length);
00258     ubyte type = read_ubyte(buf,length);
00259     if(type != 1){
00260       cout << "Received an unknown type of detector message" << endl;
00261       disconnect();
00262       exit(-1);
00263     }
00264     if(debug)
00265       cout << "Debug: Loop Detectors events for intersection " << scatsIntersectionId << endl;
00266     Intersection* intersection = scenario->getIntersection(scatsIntersectionId);
00267     assert(intersection != NULL);
00268 
00269     DetectorEventSet des;
00270     // Each intersection can have more than one event for each detector
00271     while(*length > 0){
00272       // Getting detector information
00273       int scatsDetectorId = read_ubyte(buf,length);
00274       Detector* detector = intersection->getDetector(scatsDetectorId);
00275       assert(detector != NULL);
00276       // Reading the number of events for the detector
00277       int numEvents = read_ubyte(buf,length);
00278 
00279       if(debug)
00280         cout << "Debug: Detector " << scatsDetectorId << " Events " << numEvents << endl;
00281 
00282       for(int i=0;i<numEvents;i++){
00283         // 2 bytes of data, where 1 bit is for the activation and 15 are for duration of event
00284         int val = 256*read_ubyte(buf,length) + read_ubyte(buf,length);
00285         int duration = (val & 0x7fff); // In ms ( This AND operation just erases the first bit )
00286         bool activated = (val & 0x8000) > 0; // The first bit says if it was activated
00287         des.push_back(new DetectorEvent(intersection, detector, activated, duration));
00288 
00289         if(debug){
00290           cout << "Debug: Event " << i << (activated ? " Activated " : " Deactivated ") << " for " << duration << endl; 
00291         }
00292       
00293       }
00294     
00295       if(debug)
00296         cout << endl;
00297         
00298     }
00299     
00300 
00301     return new Event(intersection, des);
00302   }
00303 
00309   int SP38Interface::receive_message(ClientSocket* client_socket){
00310  
00311     static byte* buf;
00312     if(in_length == 0)
00313       try {
00314         buf = in_message_buffer;
00315         in_length = client_socket->recv((char*)buf);
00316       } catch ( SocketException& e ) {
00317         cout << "Couldnt receive message - Exception was caught:" << e.description() << "\n";
00318       }
00319     // Reading the header
00320     int message_length = read_short(&buf,&in_length);
00321     ubyte message_type = read_ubyte(&buf,&in_length);
00322   
00323     if(debug){
00324       cout << "Debug: Received message type " << (int)message_type << " with length " << message_length << endl << endl;
00325     }
00326 
00327     // Taking message type length off
00328     message_length -= sizeof(ubyte); 
00329     in_length -= message_length;
00330     // Reading the rest of the message with the specific function
00331     switch(message_type){
00332     case SIMULATOR_READY_SP38:
00333       read_sim_ready_message(&buf, &message_length);
00334       break;
00335     case SIMULATOR_START_SP38: 
00336       read_sim_start_message(&buf, &message_length);
00337       break;
00338     case SIMULATOR_DETECTOR_SP38:
00339       events.push_back(read_sim_detector_message(&buf, &message_length));    
00340       break; 
00341     case SIMULATOR_ERROR_INMSG_SP38:
00342       read_sim_error_in_message(&buf, &message_length);
00343       break;
00344     case SIMULATOR_CYCLE_FINISHED_SP38:
00345     case SIMULATOR_FINISHED_SP38:
00346     case SIMULATOR_END_SP38:
00347       break;
00348     default:
00349       cout << endl << "Can't receive or handle message type: " << (int)message_type << endl;
00350       return SIMULATOR_UNKNOWN_SP38;
00351     }
00352   
00353     return message_type;
00354   }

00363   void SP38Interface::write_buf_ready_message(byte* buf, int* length){
00364   
00365     write_char(SIMULATOR_RATE_DEFAULT_SP38,&buf,length);
00366     write_char(strlen(PROTOCOL_SP38),&buf,length);
00367     write_string(PROTOCOL_SP38,&buf,length);
00368     write_string(VERSION_SP38,&buf,length);
00369 
00370     // Extending the length - Protocol thingy
00371     (*length) += strlen(PROTOCOL_SP38);
00372     (*length) += strlen(VERSION_SP38);
00373 
00374     if(debug){
00375       cout << "Debug: Sending client ready message... " << endl;
00376       cout << "Debug: Simulation rate " << (int)SIMULATOR_RATE_DEFAULT_SP38 << endl;
00377       cout << "Debug: Protocol size " << (int)strlen(PROTOCOL_SP38) << endl;
00378       cout << "Debug: Protocol " << PROTOCOL_SP38 << endl;
00379       cout << "Debug: Version " << VERSION_SP38 << endl;
00380       cout << endl;
00381     }
00382 
00383   }

00392   void SP38Interface::write_buf_schedule_data_message(Schedule* s, byte* buf, int* length){
00393 
00394     assert(s != NULL);
00395 
00396     Intersection* i = s->getIntersection();
00397     SignalGroupChangeSet sgcs = s->getSignalGroupChangeSet();
00398     write_int(i->getScatsId(),&buf,length);
00399 
00400     if(debug){
00401       cout << "Debug: Sending schedule for Intersection " << i->getId() << endl;
00402     }
00403 
00404     for(SignalGroupChangeSet::iterator c = sgcs.begin(); c != sgcs.end(); c++){
00405       write_char((char)(*c)->getSignalGroup()->getScatsId(),&buf,length);
00406       write_char((char)(*c)->getState(),&buf,length);
00407     
00408       if(debug){
00409         cout << "Debug: Signal Group " << (*c)->getSignalGroup()->getScatsId();
00410         cout << " new state " << (*c)->getState() << endl;
00411       }
00412 
00413     }
00414     if(debug)
00415       cout << endl;
00416 
00417   }

00425   void SP38Interface::send_message(ubyte message_type, ClientSocket* client_socket){
00426     send_message(NULL,message_type,client_socket);
00427   }

00436   void SP38Interface::send_message(Schedule* s, ubyte message_type, ClientSocket* client_socket){
00437 
00438     byte* buf = out_message_buffer;
00439     out_length = 0;
00440   
00441     // Taking, if necessary, an appropriate function to serialize data
00442     switch(message_type){
00443     case CLIENT_READY_SP38:
00444       write_buf_ready_message(buf+HEADER_SIZE_SP38,&out_length);
00445       break;
00446     case CLIENT_SCHEDULE_DATA_SP38: {
00447       // If schedule is empty, don't send message.
00448       if(s->getSignalGroupChangeSet().size() == 0 ) return;
00449       write_buf_schedule_data_message(s,buf+HEADER_SIZE_SP38,&out_length);
00450       break;
00451     }
00452     case CLIENT_CYCLE_FINISHED_SP38:
00453       break;
00454     default:
00455       cout << endl << "Can't send or handle message type: " << (int)message_type << endl;
00456       exit(-1);
00457     }
00458     // Serializing the header
00459     write_short((short)out_length+1,&buf,&out_length); // Should not count the length field, but the message type
00460     write_ubyte(message_type,&buf,&out_length);
00461   
00462     // Sending the buffer
00463     try {
00464       client_socket->send((char*)out_message_buffer,out_length);
00465     } catch ( SocketException& e) {
00466       cout << "Couldnt send message - Exception was caught:" << e.description() << "\n";
00467     }
00468   
00469     if(debug){
00470       cout << "Debug: Message sent - Type: " << (int)message_type << " Real Size: " << out_length << endl; //Real means: with length field
00471       cout << endl;
00472     }
00473 
00474   }

00479   bool SP38Interface::is_simulation_running(){
00480     return communication_state == STARTED || communication_state == RUNNING ;
00481   }

00487   void SP38Interface::connect(){
00488     try {    
00489       tryConnect();
00490     } catch ( SocketException& e ){
00491       cout << "Exception was caught:" << e.description() << "\n";
00492     }
00493   }

00499   void SP38Interface::tryConnect(){
00500 
00501     Sleep(2000);
00502 
00503     client_socket = new ClientSocket(host, 2100 );
00504         
00505     receive_message(client_socket); // SIMULATOR_READY_SP38
00506     
00507     send_message(CLIENT_READY_SP38,client_socket);
00508     
00509     receive_message(client_socket); // SIMULATOR_START_SP38
00510     
00511     // Refreshing communication state
00512     communication_state = STARTED;
00513   }
00514 
00519   EventSet SP38Interface::do_step(ScheduleSet ss){
00520 
00521     assert(communication_state == STARTED || 
00522            communication_state == RUNNING);
00523 
00524     try {    
00525 
00526       ubyte message_type_rcv;
00527       // While have schedule...
00528       while(ss.size() > 0){
00529         // Takes the last schedule (the order doesnt matter)
00530         send_message(ss.back(),CLIENT_SCHEDULE_DATA_SP38,client_socket);
00531         // Removes the schedule sent
00532         ss.pop_back();
00533       }
00534     
00535       send_message(CLIENT_CYCLE_FINISHED_SP38,client_socket);
00536     
00537       // Receiving detector messages
00538       events.clear();
00539       do {
00540         // The detector events received will be placed in events 
00541         message_type_rcv = receive_message(client_socket);
00542       } while( message_type_rcv != SIMULATOR_CYCLE_FINISHED_SP38 &&
00543                message_type_rcv != SIMULATOR_FINISHED_SP38 &&
00544                message_type_rcv != SIMULATOR_END_SP38 &&
00545                message_type_rcv != SIMULATOR_UNKNOWN_SP38
00546                );
00547         
00548       // If the simulations ends 
00549       if( message_type_rcv == SIMULATOR_FINISHED_SP38 || 
00550           message_type_rcv == SIMULATOR_END_SP38 ||
00551           message_type_rcv == SIMULATOR_UNKNOWN_SP38
00552           ){
00553         disconnect();
00554       }else{
00555         communication_state = RUNNING;
00556       }
00557     
00558     } catch ( SocketException& e ){
00559       cout << "Exception was caught:" << e.description() << "\n";
00560     }
00561 
00562     return events;
00563   }
00564 
00568   void SP38Interface::disconnect(){
00569     // just the change the internal state by now
00570     communication_state = ENDED;
00571     delete client_socket;
00572   }
